thread.title: Neelakantan Nurani
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Neelakantan Nurani

author: Neelakantan Nurani
title: Neelakantan Nurani
text: We received only one part of the order that was placed. The other part is still not in store. So my review is based on only the part which arrived. We had a decent store experience and sales guy was patient and helpful taking us through the store and giving suggestions etc. It is little early for me to review, since we have used the leather recliner for only one day. So far it has been wonderful, may be will update the review once the sofa arrives and after using the furniture for some time.
